title: 10 OPI Nail Colors Everyone Agrees On For Fall Manicures
description: When giving ourselves a DIY manicure, OPI is the one brand that we keep coming back to — and for good reason. OPI nail polishes are famously chip-resistant for longer, with the Infinite Shine range promising a gel-like finish that can last for up to 11 days. The brand also pulls off trendy crossovers like no other, releasing swoon-worthy collaborations inspired by pop culture icons like Hello Kitty and Barbie. And, let’s not forget the long list of classic OPI colors that have gone viral on TikTok: Lincoln Park After Dark, Big Red Apple, and Bubble Bath, to name a few.Now that cozy season is officially upon us, it’s the perfect time to swap out your summer brights for deep, vampy hues that capture the vibe of the months ahead. Happily, OPI’s lineup of new launches and cult-favorites are here to deliver. Whether you're after a rich burgundy, an earthy neutral, or something with just a touch of festive shimmer, the OPI shades ahead are about to be your new seasonal favorites.At Refinery29, we’re here to help you navigate this overwhelming world of stuff. All of our market picks are independently selected and curated by the editorial team. If you buy something we link to on our site, Refinery29 may earn commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.The "Ga" is SilentPerfectly timed to capitalize on yet another pop culture phenomenon, the OPI x Wicked Collection consist of 12 whimsical shades inspired by characters in the upcoming musical blockbuster. We’re positively enchanted by The "Ga" is Silent, a pearly, translucent neutral which calls to mind the bubbly Glinda The Good Witch (aka “Galinda”, her original name before arriving at Shiz University).Shop UltaOPI Infinite Shine The "Ga" is Silent, $, available at UltaMy Italian Is A Little RustyThis reddish-brown shade reminds us of falling leaves and pumpkin spice lattes, both quintessential hallmarks of fall. It's a warm, versatile shade that can be dressed up or down.Shop AmazonOPI My Italian is a Little Rusty, $, available at AmazonI'm Not Really a WaitressA cool burgundy red will never go out of favor for colder months. OPI’s interpretation of the jewel tone comes with a flirty name, tons of shimmer, and a glossy shine that won’t budge until you see fit to remove it.Shop UltaOPI Infinite Shine I'm Not Really a Waitress, $, available at UltaOPI'm Phosphorescent!Brat green isn’t dead! In fact, it’s back with a vengeance as Wicked green. This glow-in-the-dark top coat perfectly captures the feisty and imaginative personality of Elphaba, our favorite green-skinned Wicked Witch of the West.Shop UltaOPI Infinite Shine OPI'm Phosphorescent!, $, available at UltaLush HourMatching your nail color to the season’s harvest is a fun way to step up your manicure game. With figs at their ripest around this time of year, this creamy deep purple is a winner.Shop UltaOPI Infinite Shine Lush Hour, $, available at UltaBlack OnyxAs timeless as a black leather jacket, this true black lacquer will complement any type of autumn ensemble, be it your Halloween costume or a velvet maxi dress.Shop UltaOPI Black Onyx, $, available at UltaOzmopolitanWe find ourselves reaching for darker polish as we switch our wardrobe over to knitted sweaters and heavy wool coats. This pearlescent olive green, a limited-edition shade inspired by the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, is sure to be a compliment magnet this fall.Shop UltaOPI Infinite Shine Ozmopolitan, $, available at UltaYou Don't Know Jacques!We like to think of this grey-brown taupe as the younger sister of the bestselling Lincoln Park After Dark. It’s a deep color that makes an impact without being too severe, and lends a chic, polished edge to practically every type of outfit.Shop UltaOPI You Don't Know Jacques!, $, available at UltaPure Jean-iusThe greyish undertones makes this denim-inspired shade an almost-neutral that complements all outfits, while the glossy formulation gives fingertips an expensive-looking finish.Shop UltaOPI Pure Jean-ius, $, available at UltaAlpine SnowA good white nail polish is hard to find, so it’s no wonder that Alpine Snow remains one of the top three bestsellers for OPI. The crisp, opaque white hue is perfect for doing an at-home French manicure, or painting all-over for a frosted look.Shop UltaOPI Infinite Shine Alpine Snow, $, available at UltaLike what you see? How about some more R29 goodness, right here?11 Halloween Nail Trends That Aren't CornyThese Under-$50 Perfume Dupes Are Spot OnI'm A Former Nail Biter & These Treatments Work
author: Venus Wong
excerpt: Whether you're after a rich burgundy, an earthy neutral or a touch of festive shimmer, OPI nail polishes are perfect for fall.

html:
When giving ourselves a DIY manicure, OPI is the one brand that we keep coming back to — and for good reason. OPI nail polishes are famously chip-resistant for longer, with the Infinite Shine range promising a gel-like finish that can last for up to 11 days. The brand also pulls off trendy crossovers like no other, releasing swoon-worthy collaborations inspired by pop culture icons like Hello Kitty and Barbie. And, let’s not forget the long list of classic OPI colors that have gone viral on TikTok: Lincoln Park After Dark, Big Red Apple, and Bubble Bath, to name a few.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

Now that cozy season is officially upon us, it’s the perfect time to swap out your summer brights for deep, vampy hues that capture the vibe of the months ahead. Happily, OPI’s lineup of new launches and cult-favorites are here to deliver. Whether you're after a rich burgundy, an earthy neutral, or something with just a touch of festive shimmer, the OPI shades ahead are about to be your new seasonal favorites.

At Refinery29, we’re here to help you navigate this overwhelming world of stuff. All of our market picks are independently selected and curated by the editorial team. If you buy something we link to on our site, Refinery29 may earn commission.

1 of 10

The "Ga" is Silent

Perfectly timed to capitalize on yet another pop culture phenomenon, the OPI x Wicked Collection consist of 12 whimsical shades inspired by characters in the upcoming musical blockbuster. We’re positively enchanted by The "Ga" is Silent, a pearly, translucent neutral which calls to mind the bubbly Glinda The Good Witch (aka “Galinda”, her original name before arriving at Shiz University).

Shop Ulta

2 of 10

My Italian Is A Little Rusty

This reddish-brown shade reminds us of falling leaves and pumpkin spice lattes, both quintessential hallmarks of fall. It's a warm, versatile shade that can be dressed up or down.

Shop Amazon

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

3 of 10

I'm Not Really a Waitress

A cool burgundy red will never go out of favor for colder months. OPI’s interpretation of the jewel tone comes with a flirty name, tons of shimmer, and a glossy shine that won’t budge until you see fit to remove it.

Shop Ulta

4 of 10

OPI'm Phosphorescent!

Brat green isn’t dead! In fact, it’s back with a vengeance as Wicked green. This glow-in-the-dark top coat perfectly captures the feisty and imaginative personality of Elphaba, our favorite green-skinned Wicked Witch of the West.

Shop Ulta

5 of 10

Lush Hour

Matching your nail color to the season’s harvest is a fun way to step up your manicure game. With figs at their ripest around this time of year, this creamy deep purple is a winner.

Shop Ulta

6 of 10

Black Onyx

As timeless as a black leather jacket, this true black lacquer will complement any type of autumn ensemble, be it your Halloween costume or a velvet maxi dress.

Shop Ulta

7 of 10

Ozmopolitan

We find ourselves reaching for darker polish as we switch our wardrobe over to knitted sweaters and heavy wool coats. This pearlescent olive green, a limited-edition shade inspired by the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, is sure to be a compliment magnet this fall.

Shop Ulta

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

8 of 10

You Don't Know Jacques!

We like to think of this grey-brown taupe as the younger sister of the bestselling Lincoln Park After Dark. It’s a deep color that makes an impact without being too severe, and lends a chic, polished edge to practically every type of outfit.

Shop Ulta

9 of 10

Pure Jean-ius

The greyish undertones makes this denim-inspired shade an almost-neutral that complements all outfits, while the glossy formulation gives fingertips an expensive-looking finish.

Shop Ulta

10 of 10

Alpine Snow

A good white nail polish is hard to find, so it’s no wonder that Alpine Snow remains one of the top three bestsellers for OPI. The crisp, opaque white hue is perfect for doing an at-home French manicure, or painting all-over for a frosted look.

Shop Ulta
